| HistoryText             = The short-lived group known as the Shock Troop were formed by [[Anthony Druid (Earth-616)|Doctor Druid]].  He used his powers of mesmerism to recruit the other members into joining his battle against evil.

Very few adventures of the group are recorded before they apparently disbanded.{{Citation}}
